interpretation.accuracy_effect: Very small (h < 0.05). Would need >75K samples for 80% power.
interpretation.yesratio_effect: Small-to-medium. The calibration shift is the more robust finding.
interpretation.bayesian_conclusion: P(VIAR better) = 67.8% (accuracy), 100.0% (yes-ratio). Bayesian analysis favors VIAR for yes-ratio shift but is inconclusive for accuracy.
